reviewText: It was way too long between this release and the second but after burning through the season in 2 days, it was well worth it!  Definitely the best of the three DVDs - I need more Bubba!
It was a good series when it was on TV.  Pleasant to watch again with Don Johnson looking fantastic and Cheech Marin making us smile.
great show
Love Nash Bridges series - Just love Don Johnson's portrayal of the character.
The packaging holding the disc was like someone stepped on it.  It was in pieces.  The show was great.  The container sucked.
I ordered 3 seasons for my Husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves them!
Great show for the price
good show.came fast
great
Great - I enjoyed the whole series. Wish there were more episodes
Very entertaining funny lots of action and good family moments in show not disappointed in season 3 must season to watch including last show in season 3
Everyone should buy!! Loved every minute of it!!Can't wait for them to release the 4th, 5th, & 6th seasons. Buy It!!
fast paced action.  Don Johnson and Cheech Marin make the perfect dynamic duo crime fighters in the San Francisco Bay area.
Sit back, relax, grab a glass of wine, then watch well dressed men drive around in an ugly car.  It's so ugly it's cute.
Why cant all the other seasons come to the US as well?  Real fans miss it!  We need seasons 4 through 6
wished I had watched it when it aired on tv but I watched reruns years latter an it's an awesome show funny drama every thing you want in a tv show
I have played all five discs several times and really enjoy the show.  I never liked Don Johnson in MIami Vice but love him in Nash Bridges.

Don Johnson does a superb Job in this set in San Francisco series. Rather than killing a couple of dozen people like so many Hollywood cop shows. They seem to know that Circumstantial evidence is usually better than direct (eye witness testimony) evidence. Johnson plays a person with real flaws.
great series, I rate it all five stars cause I really like this program, what more can I say, loved it

I loved watching the third season, but on disc 5 one of the shows screwed up so I could not watch it.  I was disappointed!!  When are the rest of the seaaons going to be ready for the rest of his run??  I really want to see them!!

Thank you,
Birgit Spyros

As good as it was going, it stopped!!! There has to be a continuation of Nash Bridges, I don't want to have to but Seasons 4,5 & 6 from Japan!!

Other than that, this series got better than the first two. The storylines were great, the plots also and Don & Cheech jelled well. This is one of my favorite shows!
have been waiting for Nash Bridges to come out in DVD, can't  wait for the rest of the show to come out in DVD

Good detective series.
Not to heavy but interesting and believable.
Definitely worth watching for those who like Don Johnson acting.
Zero complaints on the purchase of this series III Nash Bridges.  Always been a fan and it's nice to have it to watch at our choosing.  I recommend it.

Just would love to know what happened to this series.  I know Don Johnson settled his suit with the studio and they should release the dvd for the remaining series.  Why so long?  Man, we as the public sure do get dumped on when it comes to releasing these shows. They just tease us with only a few seasons and then cut it off.  They release all other shows but not the ones that people write about all the time.  Wish I knew someone in the business.  Can't wait for the additional seasons, maybe they will be released before I grow old and gray!!!!!!!
Enjoyed this program when it was on CBS.Has humor and seriousness in the show. Always fun to watch with Don Johnson and Cheech Marin.

I've watched all three seasons so far - waiting for the rest to become available.  I didn't watch it when it was on TV - thought I would give it a try - it's a GREAT show with great storylines and love the 'Cuda!! - you need to watch them in order.
Great show! I am very pleased with my puchase. It was delivered on time and in great condition. I ordered all the seasons of Nash Bridges and love them.

Nash Bridges was one of my favorite shows of the 70's.  Thanx for bringing back the good ole days, and hope you will continue to bring back more of the same.  Can't wait till number 4 arrives.  Television today; for the most part; stinks.

We were glad to get this 3rd season of Nash Bridges from Amazon.  this show was funny.  I personally enjoyed watching Jodi Lynn O'Keefe grow up on this show before starting her career.  The price was reasonable, and the delivery was fast.

Dear Amazon, My wife and I extremely satisfied with your first class operation and business. I feel safe with buying on line with you people. Every disc I have received from you has worked perfectly. I have all of the Hawaii Five O except season 11 and 12. I'm still waiting for Police Woman seasons to be released.

F.M Miller. Oklahoma City, OK.

Wish they would release the rest of the seasons. It seems to be a problem with a lot of other TV series. Still waiting for "Walker Season 8" (what's up this one, seeing even the Final Season was released over 2 yrs. ago?), "Fresh Prince of Bel Air Season 6", "Starsky & Hutch Season 5", "George Lopez Season 3", plus, etc. Wonder what's happening why the rest of these shows are not being released on DVD? Nash Bridges is one of my favorites, just like the others I mentioned above, but it's really frustrating if you start to buy the seasons that are available without realizing the the rest may never come out. I call it a major ""rip-off" by the DVD industry. Being very, very careful about what buying from now - after all, it's my money they're taking. The last season of "The Shield" was out in no time at all - why can't they do the same with other shows? I know there are contracts. permits, etc. involved, but please - give the buyer a warning if they have to wait around for years to complete their collections. Who knows - they might not be around then!
I love every season of this show!  Don Johnson and Cheech Marin have wonderful chemistry that continues through this season.
I also own season 1 and 2.  I will continue to purchase all the seasons.  I love this show!!!
I always loved Nash Bridges and I keep watching the dvds of the first 3 seasons and now I can't wait to buy the rest! Hope CBS will issue 4th 5th and 6th very soon!!!

I real love "Nash Bridges". It make me laugh. I remember that movie in tv show when I very young by long ago. I still love that movie. I so happy that set on DVD. I so happy brought that. I notice that movie not finish make dvd (Nash Bridges 4 to ?). I had movie "Nash Bridges" 1,2,3 Season. But I can't wait more buy it 4 to ? Season. Hehe! Thanks! God bless you!

3 YEARS and counting. Where are the rest of the seasons? This gets old with so many shows putting out either partial series or partial seasons. The music issue is annoying enough...the reason I don't own WKRP. Time to finish the series...you have influence.

I got these dvds for my son for Christmas he was very happy.  He remembers watch Nash as
a kid and was impressed by the show and the Cuda car. I think the show is very cheesy but
he was happy to get it. The price is high.
This season is amazing and I'm so happy I finally own it!! It is a must have for all Don Johnson fans!!!

I don't remember the songs that are not in the show, But Don Johnson is the coolest. I wish season 4 would come out faster, it is like Miami Vice a season a year, it took that long, but i guess the best is worth the wait.

Ok let me be clear about this....I love this series. It dominated my Friday nights from 1996-2001. BUT, this is not what I remembered and we should get a price break on it; however; this is to RATE the item. And, I HATE rating it like I do, cause I loved this series.

So, here goes...

If I were to rate it based on the action & storylines I remember--I'd be 5 stars.

If I were to rate it based on the lack of the music or music changes from the original CBS airings--It'd be NO STARS.

Now, I am usually an easy-going person. But, when I want the COMPLETE SERIES or the COMPLETE SEASON, I want it complete & unaltered. That is not what I got. One episode for example--REVELATIONS; is a mess. One of my most favorite episodes of this season and truthfully, the "new" ending really sucks.

At the end as Nash was driving away in the 'Cuda, you heard Van Morrison's "Into The Mystic". I know because I had to call the production office to find the name of the song.

Alas, it was replaced by something else and less meaningful. Same as the episode "Sacraments"--the song at the end (in the original airing) was Eric Clapton's "My Father's Eyes"; again replaced with something less meaningful and to me, degrades the series and what it accomplished. I haven't seen the entire season, but I would bet most of the really great music has been altered. That is what made this series what it was at times--the music.

If I were not so dedicated to the series, and didn't want to waste my time recording it on DVR and transferring it to my own DVDS, I would stop ordering future seasons. I am half tempted to do so.....BUT...I asked for it on DVD and as my mother said "be careful what you wish for" as well as "having a thing isn't so pleasing as wanting"....so I will have to deal with it. I would encourage people who remember the series for what it was to contact Paramount and voice your displeasure, as I intend to do. I thought seasons 1 & 2 were "over-sights", clearly it is not.

The good things? The packaging is still good--plastic case designed to hold multiple discs, a real space-saving design. The item arrived in great shape and when promised. But don't expect any special features.

Overall, I will give it 3 stars; though I hope CBS can quit *crewing up a good thing. If it's the money deal, I would pay more for what I want & remember as opposed to cheap for cheap :)
brand new.  played great
I enjoyed this show when it was on in the 90's. It is fun to watch it again, especially the interplay between Johnson and Marin.
Don Johnson never been better
It is great!!
this was just as I remember it.  great show .  glad I found it on dvd
My favorite show - now i can watch them anytime - perfect service - good merchandise.
My favorite love Nash
Good DVD
Perfect.

At the time this show was on I was on active duty with the Navy so I did not not get to see it very often. While on a port visit to San Francisco we were able to see the filming of an episode and the producers (star Don Johnson was one of them) arranged for three of the bright yellow "Hemi Cudas used for the show to be hands on for pictures with crewmembers.
